name: Deep into the forest (Slouby92)
description:
It's late ! To late to start an episode of a show or launch a game that take time but you still want to play at something ? Deep into the forest is the solution ! It's a short and chill game made to play when you don't have lot of time do it.

You are at the top of a hill into the forest and you need to join the civilization. Follow the smoke and use water, mushroom and wood to survive.

This game is  the first completed game i made alone. It took me two month while i was  studying and working. I hope you'll enjoy it !
